# float_range struct

> **来源**: https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/versedotorg/scenegraph/float_range
> **爬取时间**: 2025-12-27T00:52:30.774310

---

A range with a minimum and maximum value. For a value to fall inside of this range, the min value must be less than or equal to the max value.

|  |  |
| --- | --- |
| Verse `using` statement | `using { /Verse.org/SceneGraph }` |

## Members

This struct has data members, but no functions.

### Data

| Data Member Name | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `Minimum` | `float` |  |
| `Maximum` | `float` |  |
